thread.section_title: The Westin New York at Times Square - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great Hotel
thread.title_full: Great Hotel - Review of The Westin New York at Times Square, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: McStrokin
title: Great Hotel
text: The Westin Time Square was magnificent. Very modern decor and clean as whistle. My view of Manhattan was amazing. I would recommend staying here if you want to be right in the heart of Time Square. Sits right on top of the subway system. Not to far from Madison Square Garden, Grand Central StAtion, Central Park or the Emperor State Building.
